long_description:
= RightScale Oracle Database Cookbook

== DESCRIPTION:

Provides the Oracle implementation of the 'db' resource to install and manage
Oracle database stand-alone servers and clients.

== REQUIREMENTS:

* Requires a server launched from a RightScale managed RightImage.

== COOKBOOKS DEPENDENCIES:

Please see <tt>metadata.rb</tt> file for the latest dependencies.

== KNOWN LIMITATIONS:

There are no known limitations.

== SETUP:

* Place the <tt>db_oracle::default</tt> recipe into your runlist to load the
  Oracle provider, tuning parameters, as well as other Oracle-specific attributes
  into the node as inputs.

* Place the <tt>db::default</tt> recipe into your runlist to set up the 'db' resource.
  When using a RightScale ServerTemplate, this will also automatically add the
  common database attributes to your ServerTemplate's inputs.

== USAGE:

=== Basic usage

Once setup, use the recipes in the 'db' cookbook to install and manage your
Oracle database servers and clients. See the <tt>db/README.rdoc</tt> for usage
details.

=== Oracle Tuning

Custom tuning parameters can be applied by overriding the
<tt>oracle_tuning.rb</tt> attributes file. For more information and an example
override repository please see: {Override Chef Cookbooks}[http://support.rightscale.com/12-Guides/Chef_Cookbooks_Developer_Guide/08-Chef_Development/Override_Chef_Cookbooks].

== DETAILS:

The 'db' implementation is defined by a Lightweight Provider, which can be
found in the <tt>providers/default.rb</tt> file.

= LICENSE:

Copyright RightScale, Inc. All rights reserved.  All access and use subject to
the RightScale Terms of Service available at http://www.rightscale.com/terms.php
and, if applicable, other agreements such as a RightScale Master Subscription
Agreement.

oracle/install_file2_url.description: Url to the oracle zip file

db/sysman/password.description: The SYSMAN password for the starter db

oracle/server/private_ip.description: Server Private IP.  Use env:PRIVATE_IP/Oracle Server

db/dbsnmp/password.description: The DBSNMP password for the starter db

db/system/password.description: The SYSTEM password for the starter db

db/dns/master/id.description:
The unique identifier that is associated with the DNS A record 
of the master database server. The unique identifier is assigned by the DNS provider 
when you create a dynamic DNS A record. This ID is used to update the associated 
A record with the private IP address of the master server when this recipe is run. 
If you are using DNS Made Easy as your DNS provider, a 7-digit number is used 
(e.g., 4403234).

oracle/install_file1_url.description: Url to the oracle zip file

db/sys/password.description: The SYS password for the starter db

license: Copyright RightScale, Inc. All rights reserved.
name: db_oracle

recipes.db_oracle::register_master: Register master database server with DNS service
recipes.db_oracle::install_local_and_sandbox_oci: installs ruby oci-8 on the oracle db server
recipes.db_oracle::default: Set the DB Oracle provider. Sets version and node variables specific to the chosen MySQL version.

description: Installs/configures a Oracle database client and server.
